public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

The main frame of the program. Created by statalign.StatAlign when run in graphical mode.

finished

public void finished(int errorCode,
                     java.lang.Exception ex)
Enables several menu items that were kept disabled during the run.

Parameters:
errorCode - -1: error 0: completed 1: stopped after sampling 2: stopped before sampling
ex - the exception that was thrown when errorCode = -1
